article_title: Lawmakers to Probe Flu Vaccine Production Process
article_text:
Public-health officials are facing tough questions about the nation’s preparedness for seasonal flu in the wake of the poor match between this year’s vaccine and the strain of flu circulating most widely in the U.S.

Armed with statistics on the extent of mismatch, House lawmakers on Tuesday will examine how selection and production of the vaccine can be improved to keep pace with constantly mutating influenza viruses.

...

twitter.description: The poor match between the strain of flu circulating most widely in the U.S. and the vaccine meant to protect people against it will be the subject of a House committee hearing Tuesday.
twitter.creator: @betswrites

image.alt: Lawmakers will probe Tuesday how to improve vaccine in midst of bad #flu season

article_summary: Public-health officials are facing tough questions about the nation’s preparedness for seasonal flu in the wake of the poor match between this year’s vaccine and the strain of flu circulating most widely in the U.S.Armed with statistics on the extent of mismatch, House lawmakers on Tuesday will examine how selection and production of the vaccine can be improved to keep pace with constantly mutating influenza viruses.
